name: CT Special Forces 3: BioTerror
description: CT Special Forces 3: Bioterror (Also known as CT Special Forces 3: Navy Ops) is a run and gun game for the Game Boy Advance and PlayStation, developed and published by LSP (Light and Shadow Production) for Game Boy Advance and PlayStation in 2004. It is the third title in the CT Special Forces Series and the last game for Game Boy Advance and PlayStation platforms.
